name: DFM - Calculate Total Allocated Amount in DFM Bank Payment on Submitted Document
script:
total_allocated_amount = 0.0

for detail in doc.get("dfm_bank_payment_detail"):
	total_allocated_amount = total_allocated_amount + detail.allocated_amount

# Set the total_allocated_amount in the main document
doc.total_allocated_amount = total_allocated_amount

name: DFM - Calculate Total Allocated Amount in DFM Bank Payment Log
script:
